text: Punctoterebra exiguoides is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Terebridae, the auger snails.MolluscaBase eds. (2020). MolluscaBase. Punctoterebra exiguoides (Schepman, 1913). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at: http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=1417452 on 2020-02-03 ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== ==External links== * Fedosov, A. title: Punctoterebra exiguoides
